_comment: 10-hour overnight sweep targeting Kalman noise and clustering/gating parameters.
_note: Run with fixed foreground defaults already applied (closeness=3.0, safety=0.15, neighbour=3, noise_relative=0.02, hits_to_confirm=4).
_max_combos_note: Auto-tuner enforces max 1000 combos/round. 3^5=243 is well within limit.

params.name: process_noise_pos
params.description: Position process noise. Current default 1.0, proposed optimised 0.1. Full range exploration.

params.name: process_noise_vel
params.description: Velocity process noise. Current default 5.0, proposed optimised 0.3. Sweep low end.

params.name: gating_distance_squared
params.description: Association gate radius squared. Current default 36.0, optimised 25.0. Check if reduction helps.

params.name: foreground_dbscan_eps
params.description: Clustering radius. Current default 0.8, optimised 0.7. Verify neighbourhood.
